description: This file contains JavaScript code that initializes a crossword puzzle with predefined clues and answers, using jQuery to enhance the webpage with an interactive crossword grid.

methods.name: Immediately Invoked Function Expression (IIFE)
methods.description: Encapsulates the code to avoid polluting global namespace, passing jQuery as a parameter.

methods.name: $(function() {...})
methods.description: Document ready handler that initializes the crossword puzzle.
